columns.Document_Type_Code: The unique code identifying each document type.
columns.Document_Type_Name: The name of the document type for user reference.
columns.Document_Type_Description: The detailed description of the document type.

Ref_Document_Types.table_description: The table stores document types used in the tracking system.

columns.Calendar_Date: The specific date used for tracking calendar events.
columns.Day_Number: The numeric representation of the day within the week.

Ref_Calendar.table_description: The table provides a reference for calendar dates and corresponding day numbers.

columns.Location_Code: The unique code identifying each location.
columns.Location_Name: The name of the location for user reference.
columns.Location_Description: The detailed description of the specific location.

Ref_Locations.table_description: The table stores locations for tracking documents.

columns.Role_Code: The unique code identifying each role within the organization.
columns.Role_Name: The name of the role for user reference.
columns.Role_Description: The detailed description of the role's responsibilities.

Roles.table_description: The table defines roles for employees in the organization.

columns.Document_ID: The unique identifier for each document in the database.
columns.Date_Stored: The date and time when the document was stored.
columns.Document_Type_Code: The code identifying the type of the document.
columns.Document_Name: The name or title of the document.
columns.Document_Description: The summary or overview of the document's content.
columns.Other_Details: The additional details or notes related to the document.

All_Documents.table_description: The table manages all documents and their associated metadata.

columns.Employee_ID: The unique identifier for each employee in the organization.
columns.Role_Code: The code identifying the role assigned to the employee.
columns.Employee_Name: The full name of the employee for identification.
columns.Gender_MFU: The gender of the employee, represented by a single character.
columns.Date_of_Birth: The birth date of the employee for record purposes.
columns.Other_Details: The additional notes or information regarding the employee.

Employees.table_description: The table manages employee records within the organization.

columns.Document_ID: The unique identifier for each document's location tracking.
columns.Location_Code: The code identifying the location where the document is stored.
columns.Date_in_Location_From: The starting date and time the document was at the location.
columns.Date_in_Locaton_To: The ending date and time the document was removed from the location.

Document_Locations.table_description: The table tracks the locations and duration of documents within the system.

columns.Document_ID: The unique identifier for each document marked for destruction.
columns.Destruction_Authorised_by_Employee_ID: The employee ID authorizing the document destruction.
columns.Destroyed_by_Employee_ID: The employee ID responsible for executing the destruction.
columns.Planned_Destruction_Date: The scheduled date and time for the document's destruction.
columns.Actual_Destruction_Date: The actual date and time when the document was destroyed.
columns.Other_Details: The additional information related to the document destruction process.

Documents_to_be_Destroyed.table_description: The table tracks documents slated for destruction along with relevant details.
